stone.io

Class ProgressMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • stone.io.ProgressMonitor

  • public class ProgressMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    A progress monitor either using a GUI or printing on stdout to display a progress.
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Method Detail

      • beginTask

        public final void beginTask(java.lang.String paramString,
                            int paramInt)
        Starts a new task, sets the message and scales for 100%
        Parameters:
        paramString - message to be shown
        paramInt - units representing 100%, -1 if unknown. The scale size can be set later by calling beginTaskPreservingProgress(String, int)

      • beginTaskPreservingProgress

        public final void beginTaskPreservingProgress(java.lang.String paramString,
                                              int paramInt)
        Starts a new task, sets the message and scales for 100%
        Parameters:
        paramString - message to be shown
        paramInt - units representing 100%

        Ends the task
        Parameters:
        text - passed to GUIInterface.endProgress(String)

        Parameters:

        Sets the message of a running progress
        Parameters:

        Adds to current progress paramInt units
        Parameters:
